title: István Csirmaz
text:
István Csirmaz (born 4 May 1995 in <a href="Mez%C5%91k%C3%B6vesd">Mezőkövesd</a>) is a <a href="Hungarian%20people">Hungarian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="Szolnoki%20M%C3%81V%20FC">Szolnoki MÁV FC</a>.
Club statistics.
"Updated to games played as of 9 December 2017."
